content:
Priydarshi Singh is a first year undergraduate student at Indian Institute Of Technology, Kanpur, majoring in Aerospace Engineering. His academic interests include cyber security and artificial intelligence. He is a learning developer.
For recreation he prefers mind sports like chess, competitive programming or puzzling. He is also an avid quizzer, a swimmer and a budding water-polo player.

title: Priydarshi Singh

summary: A cryptographically secure web portal to manage online elections.
title: Online Election Manager
